RACE.RACE_TEXT: Jonathan Kiser Novice S. SARATOGA RACE 1 2 1/16M Hurdle CR: N/A. Stakes Purse 75000. TO BE RUN OVER NATIONAL FENCES FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON OVER HURDLES PRIOR TO MARCH 1, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES, OTHER THAN THREE YEAR OLD. Non-Lasix Race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 h ours of post time. Four year olds, 144 lbs.; Older 150 lbs. Winners, other than maiden, claiming, starter or three year old, 3 lbs extra for each race won.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MCTIGUE (IRE) tracked the front from the two path early on jumping well to maintain position, took to the inside after flight three and remained inside until tipped out after clearing the seventh fence, jumped well over the final flight and advanced on the leader to take over command in the fourth and final turn, came under urging midway on that bend, edged clear under a drive in the flat and was kept to task to the finish. AWAKENED tracked the pace along the inside, jumped late at flight five, came under urging after the final fence and improved position to be in closest pursuit of the aforementioned foe midway on the last turn, ran on willingly to chase that rival home well clear of the rest and along second best. MERRY MAKER (IRE) saved ground in pursuit from mid pack, jumped late at five landing with more pressure towards the hind end, came under urging once in the flat after clearing fence eight and improved position to secure the show honors. BARBADOS (IRE) just off the inside near the rear of the field, landed just off the heels of SOLOMOON at flight five and was briefly taken hold of, came under urging after clearing fence seven and jumped well to maintain position, passed tired rivals in the flat. CARAMELISED (GB) a bit washy, pulled keenly early on along the inside of REALIST who matched strides in the early going, widened away as a team jumping well to maintain the front under some pressure from the presence of his early pace rival, shook off that foe after flight four and showed the way now clear of the field through to fence seven, came under challenge after the final flight and got placed to urging into the final turn, got displaced from command nearing three furlongs to go, faded in the flat and tired in the stretch. SOLOMOON (GB) tracked just off the inside from mid pack, jumped late at fence five and placed BARBADOS off his heels at that station, came under urging at the flight seven, tired in the flat and was eased home to the finish. REALIST (GB) pulled eagerly from the two path early on matching strides with CARAMELISED to the inside, got shaken off at the fourth fence and chased in closest aim steadily in retreat to the main flight in behind, came under urging at fence seven now entirely engulfed by the rest of the field, dropped back folding to last into the flat, and was eased home to the finish. RESTITUTION (FR) three wide through the first two turns when tracking three wide, came under urging and under the crop after fence six, failed to quicken and was guided to leave the course prior to fence seven, then walked off under his own power.

ENTRY.NAME: Awakened
ENTRY.OWNER: Riverdee Stable and Ten Strike Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked ins, late at 5, urged after 8, ran on willingly, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Merry Maker (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved grd mid pack, late at 5, urged after 8, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Caramelised (GB)
ENTRY.OWNER: Sheppard, Sharon E. and Johnston, Gillian
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit washy, pulled keen ins, jumped well, faded flat, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Realist (GB)
ENTRY.COMMENT: pulled eager 2p early, shaken off 4, urged 7, folded, eased home

ENTRY.NAME: Barbados (IRE)
ENTRY.OWNER: Colton, Jr., Richard C. and Thayer, Stella
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p near rear, coaxed after 7, passed tired rivals

ENTRY.NAME: Solomoon (GB)
ENTRY.OWNER: Potter Group USA LLC and Yorton Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2p, late at 5, urged at 7, tired, eased

ENTRY.NAME: McTigue (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2p, jumped well, ins after 3, up final turn, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Restitution (FR)

TRACK.NAME: Foreign track with Code of MR

ENTRY.OWNER: Capall Syndicate Racing and USA Steeplechase LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w 1st & 2nd turn, tracked 3w, urged after 6, left course prior 7

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 84. Maiden Special Weight Purse 88000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FAST BUCK FREDDY was bumped in the hindquarters at the start, showed good speed then pressed the pace on the outside, turned up the pressure in the two path on the turn, gained the advantage outside the quarter-pole, inched clear under the crop in upper stretch and proved best under steady urging. FLYING IN STYLE stumbled at the start, tracked the pace on the outside, chased in the three path on the turn, pursued the winner under a drive in the stretch and was second best. NOBILIS dropped back early then was urged along at the rear, went three then four wide on the turn, came six wide into the stretch and improved for the show. BUSTINO SANTINO broke out then lost his footing slightly, dropped back early then settled towards the rear, was urged two to three wide on the turn, swung five wide into the stretch and failed to threaten. CHALKY CAT broke out then was quickly corrected, moved up while hustled then chased the pace, climbed late on the backstretch and into the turn, chased in the two path through that bend and tired. STAVROS bobbled slightly at the start then was hustled, was taken in hand while in tight between horses early, raced on the outside under urging, went four wide on the turn, dropped back while remaining on his inside lead in upper stretch, failed to swap leads when thrown in by the rider in the vicinity of the furlong marker and came up empty. FRIDAY I'M IN LOVE broke out and bumped with a foe, moved up to set the pace under pressure to his outside, vied along the rail on the turn, lost the lead outside the quarter-pole, dropped back into the final furlong and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Chalky Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,hustled,chased,climbed1/2,2path turn,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Nobilis
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back,urged along,3-4w turn,6w into lane,improved for show

ENTRY.NAME: Bustino Santino
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out,lost footing slightly,drop back,2-3p turn,5p1/4,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Friday I'm in Love
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,bmpd,mvd up,pace ins foe,rail turn,headed1/4,gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Fast Buck Freddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmp brk,press outside,2p turn,lead1/4,edged clear,steady urging

ENTRY.NAME: Stavros
ENTRY.OWNER: SF Racing LLC Starlight Racing Madaket Stables LLC Masterson Robert E Stonestree
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled bit brk,hustld,in tight,out,4w turn,inside lead,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Flying in Style
ENTRY.COMMENT: stmbld brk,tracked outside,chased 3p turn,pursued winner,2nd best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 3 5 1/2F Turf CR: 104. Claiming Purse 64000. (UP TO $11,136 NYSBFOA) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races In 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race In 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $32,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $25,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Five and One Half Furlongs on the Main Track). (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHESS MASTER chased along the inside in aim of the leader, angled four wide into upper stretch and got let out straightened away, dug in under a drive issuing a challenge a sixteenth out and was up in the final jumps to prevail. CHUCK WILLIS (IRE) hustled from the gate, prompted the pace of LYRICAL POET from the two path getting roused taking the two path into upper stretch, dug in under a drive and was up for the place honors in the final strides. LYRICAL POET away well and to the front, showed the way lightly coaxed along the inside through swift splits and under some pressure from CHUCK WILLIS to the outside, took the inside route into upper stretch, dug in under a drive clinging to command until headed by the top pair in the final jumps to the wire. BRAZILLIONAIRE chased two to three wide under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, angled seven wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick. SEVEN SCENTS got brushed at the start, chased just off the inside under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, went seven to eight wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild bid. ME 'N SAP coaxed from the start, chased three then two wide, angled five wide into upper stretch roused for the stretch drive, made no impact. AFTER FIVE coaxed from the gate, chased four then three wide under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, angled six wide into upper stretch, came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Chuck Willis (IRE)
ENTRY.OWNER: Roman, Lawrence P. and Jacobson, David
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, prompted 2p, roused 2w 1/4p, dug in, up for 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Chess Master
ENTRY.OWNER: Paradise Farms Corp Staudacher David and Carlesmo Angelo
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased ins, angled 4w upper, let out, dug in, up final jumps

ENTRY.NAME: Brazillionaire
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2-3w, coaxed 5/16, angled 7w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Seven Scents
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed st, chased 2p, coaxed 5/16, 7-8w upper, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: Me 'n Sap
ENTRY.OWNER: Brady Horse Racing and Rusba V Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 3-2w, roused 5w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Lyrical Poet
ENTRY.COMMENT: lightly coaxed ins, ins 1/4, dug in, caught late

ENTRY.NAME: After Five
ENTRY.OWNER: Thummps Racing Stable LLC and Jacoutot Peter
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4-3w, coaxed 5/16, 6w upper, empty

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 4 1 1/8M Dirt CR: 99. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 100000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $45,000. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $45,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Du e At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OLYMPIC DREAMS prompted the pace on the outside in the three path, gained the lead late on the far turn, was asked outside the quarter-pole, came in a path at the three-sixteenths then was put to a right-handed crop, battled outside of the runner-up to the finish and proved best under strong urging. UN OJO went to the front, showed the way on the inside, was asked under threat on the far turn, lost the advantage late on that bend, came under a left-handed crop in upper stretch, fought on with the winner to the finish and missed while clear for the place. WILD BANKER moved in into the first turn, tossed his head while rank in the two path on that bend, settled more kindly on the backstretch, chased in the two path on the far turn, was driven four wide into the stretch, pursued the top two under a drive into the final sixteenth and lacked the needed kick while well clear for the show. SHADOW DRAGON moved from the rail to the two path on the first turn, settled off the pace, shifted out near the five-eighths pole, was roused late on the backstretch then angled in, dropped from the two path to the rail early on the far turn, shifted three wide outside the five-sixteenths, turned into upper stretch under a drive and came up empty. MASON MANIA was caught in the five path on the first turn, raced off the pace under urging, traveled four wide under strong encouragement going around the final turn and failed to respond. EL HERMANO moved in entering the first turn, went three wide on that bend, was urged along while outside on the backstretch, raced five wide early on the far turn, dropped to the three then two path later on that bend and was no factor. BOSSMAKINBOSSMOVES was hustled from the gate, rounded the first turn in the four path, settled on the outside, came up empty in the three path on the final turn, spun five wide into the stretch and faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Shadow Dragon
ENTRY.COMMENT: ins-2p1st,settled,mvd out5/8,ask1/2,ins-3p2nd turn,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Un Ojo
ENTRY.OWNER: Cypress Creek Equine and Whispering Oaks Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside pace,asked 2nd turn,headed outside1/4,fought on,missed

ENTRY.NAME: Olympic Dreams
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted outside 3p,took lead outside1/4,fought outside foe,best

ENTRY.NAME: Bossmakinbossmoves
ENTRY.OWNER: Clear Stars Stable and Mitre Box Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,4p1st,settled outside,empty 3p2nd turn,5p1/4,retreated

ENTRY.NAME: Wild Banker
ENTRY.OWNER: PlayingTheField Racing Final Turn Racing Stable LLC and Acqua Nova Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: mvd in,toss head rank 2p1st,settled,chsd 2p2nd,4p1/4,clear3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Mason Mania
ENTRY.OWNER: McClay, Thomas G. and Brown, Jr., Donald L.
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5p1st turn,urged along,4p2nd turn,no response

ENTRY.NAME: El Hermano
ENTRY.COMMENT: mvd in,3p1st,settled at rear,5p-2p2nd turn,no factor

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 5 1 1/16M Inner turf CR: 80. Maiden Special Weight Purse 88000. INNER TURF FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BROCKNARDINI lunged slightly at the break, chased two to three wide from mid pack, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and angled five wide at that station, was on the wrong lead and lugged in to the two path when offering a strong bid straightened away overhauling the leader just inside three-sixteenths to go, then edged clear to the finish corrected and kept to task. COACH SESSA just off the inside tracking the front from near the rear of the field, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled out four wide into upper stretch, lugged in straightened away and ran on to chase the winner home clear of the rest and along second best. BERNIETAKESCHARGE saved ground near the rear of the field, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled three wide into upper stretch and improved position to secure the show honors getting up in the very last jump to the line. RUN FOR YOUR HONEY dueled in hand along the inside with FIND YOUR JOY to the outside, widened away from the rest as a pair, had the field take closer order into the far turn and came under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, got overhauled just inside the three-sixteenths and weakened to the finish. BELVOIR coaxed from the gate, chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the far turn coming under coaxing three furlongs from home, continued in the inside route into upper stretch and weakened. ONCE AN EAGLE tracked the pace along the inside coming under brief coaxing near the quarter pole, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, was paused in behind foes through to the sixteenth marker, moved to the rail at that juncture given a tap with the crop to the right side shoulder twice while finishing without making an impact. ALOTTA JAYS brushed the off side stall at the start, chased just off the inside until tucked inside placed to coaxing at the three-eighths, cut the corner into upper stretch and made no impact. CHARITY FIRST two to three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four then three wide into upper stretch and tired. FIND YOUR JOY dueled in hand from the two path widening away in concert with her main pace foe, came under urging at the five-sixteenths, spun three then two wide into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Alotta Jays
ENTRY.OWNER: Rosenthal Robert D and Galloping Grocer Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: brush gate st, chased 2p, coaxed ins 3/8, cut corner, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Bernietakescharge
ENTRY.OWNER: Rosenthal, Robert D. and Bernstein, Bradford H.
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved grd near rear, coaxed 3/8, angled 3w upper, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Once an Eagle
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked ins, coaxed briefly 2w 1/4, paused beh foes to 1/16p

ENTRY.NAME: Brocknardini
ENTRY.OWNER: Brockley Thomas and Brockley Daryn A
ENTRY.COMMENT: lunge st, 2-3w pursuit, 5w 1/4, lug in, up 2p near 1/8, edged clr

ENTRY.NAME: Coach Sessa
ENTRY.OWNER: Madaket Stables LLC and Doheny Michael
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2p, coaxed 3/8, angled 4w upper, lug in, ran on, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Run for Your Honey
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled in hand ins, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, overhauled, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Belvoir
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2p, coaxed ins 3/8, inside 1/4, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Find Your Joy
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled in hand 2p, urged 5/16, 3-2w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Charity First
ENTRY.OWNER: Parkland Thoroughbreds and Rodriguez Rudy R
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2-3w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, 4-3w upper, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 6 1 1/16M Turf CR: 90. Claiming Purse 50000. (UP TO $8,700 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR THREE YEAR OLD FILLIES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $ 35,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile on the Main Track). (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STIR CRAZY brushed the outside of the gate then brushed with a foe at the start, was reserved while saving ground, shifted three wide late on the far turn, made a bid in the four path at the quarter-pole, dueled outside of the runner-up in the stretch, fought gamely with that foe to the finish and narrowly prevailed under strong urging. MISS M M broke out at the start, was taken under a tight hold early, followed the solo leader in the two path, gained to make a bid on the far turn, took the lead inside the five-sixteenths, was put to a drive in upper stretch, dueled gamely on the inside of the winner to the finish and just missed while clear for the place. HOME FOR CHRISTMAS was hustled from the gate, rounded the first turn in the two path, was unhurried in the back half of the field, came under urging while saving ground on the far turn, moved out under a drive near the furlong marker and weakened but was clear for the show. SYNONYMOUS brushed with a rival while last to commence, moved from the rail to the two path on the opening bend, settled towards the rear, was urged in the two path on the far turn, spun three wide into the stretch, steadied behind a rival at the three-sixteenths then altered in some and failed to threaten. BOCA dropped from the two path to the rail on the first turn, settled towards the rear, was roused while inside on the far turn, turned into the stretch in the two path then moved further out and lacked the needed response. KANNON FIRE traveled three wide on the first turn, settled on the outside, was asked while three then four wide on the far turn, dropped back into upper stretch and came up empty. POSTNUP dropped well behind while taking short strides early, went three wide on the first turn, lagged at the rear, was asked late on the backstretch, went three then four wide on the far turn, came seven wide into the stretch and failed to respond. REDZILLA broke out then was corrected and hustled, angled in while going to the front, opened up on the inside, was asked on the far turn, lost the lead inside the five-sixteenths, spun three wide into the stretch and tired. MORE MANGO went three wide on the first turn, settled on the outside, was roused three wide on the far turn, spun six wide into the stretch and had nothing left.

ENTRY.NAME: Miss M M
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,snug hold,followed leader 2p,lead1/4,dueled ins,gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Kannon Fire
ENTRY.OWNER: Zilla Racing Stables Black Jack Racing LLC and Acqua Nova Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3p1st,settled outside,3-4w2nd turn,5w1/4,empty

ENTRY.OWNER: Holt Leo and Norcross Philip A
ENTRY.COMMENT: brshd gate,brshd,reserved ins,shift 3w ins5/16,bid4p1/4,duel,game

ENTRY.NAME: Synonymous
ENTRY.COMMENT: brshd brk,ins-2p1st,settled,2p2nd turn,stdied3/16,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Home for Christmas
ENTRY.OWNER: Iglesias Jesse Abdala III Albert P and Garcia Thomas
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,2p1st,unhurried,ins2nd turn,mvd out1/8,wknd,clear show

ENTRY.NAME: Boca
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p-ins1st,towards rear,ins2nd,2p1/4,mvd out,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Postnup
ENTRY.COMMENT: drop back,short strides,3p1st,at rear,3-4p2nd,7p1/4,no response

ENTRY.NAME: More Mango
ENTRY.OWNER: Ferraro James W Barbati Kenneth B and Cespuglio Thomas
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w1st,settled outside,roused 3w2nd turn,6w1/4,no response

ENTRY.NAME: Redzilla
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,hustled,angled in,ins pace,headed ins5/16,3p1/4,tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 7 1 1/4M Dirt CR: 99. Starter Allowance Purse 50000. (UP TO $8,700 NYSBFOA) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $20,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race I n 2023 Allowed 5 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BEAR OAK coaxed from the gate, raced just off the inside through the first turn before chasing three wide down the backstretch in pursuit from mid pack, tipped four wide through the far turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, went six wide into upper stretch rallying to take command with three-sixteenths to go, then dug in under threat to the outside and held gamely to prevail. PORTOS saved ground in pursuit from near the rear early on, steadily made progress to mid pack when tipped off the rail to move around the retreating former leader and went three wide at the three-eighths, tipped four wide placed to coaxing five-sixteenths from home, following the aforementioned foe before swinging seven wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive rallying through the final furlong to latch on the leader to the outside, tussled through to the finish but was ultimately rebuffed at the end. SALTO DE TIGRE broke in at the start, chased two then three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled six wide into upper stretch and improved position to secure the show honors. LORD CAPTAIN three wide through the first turn, chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch, flattened out in the late stages. BOBBY G coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside and then just off the inside coming under coaxing three furlongs from home, angled six wide into upper stretch and passed tired rivals to the finish. LOST IN ROME coaxed from the start, chased three then two wide advancing on the leader to take command seven-sixteenths from home, showed the way through the far turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide for home clinging to command, yielded near the three-sixteenths and weakened. HANG TIGHT three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch and made no impact. KING OF HOLLYWOOD coaxed from the gate, showed the way in hand along the inside spurting away early on, had the field take closer order near the half mile pole and yielded the front at the seven-sixteenths, retreated through the turn and cornered just off the inside into upper stretch, faltered and was eased home through the stretch to the finish. CENTAVO chased just off the inside until tipped four wide through the far turn coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, swung five wide into upper stretch, tired and was eased home to the wire. JUST CALL RAY chased along the inside and then just off the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, cut the corner into upper stretch and was eased home through the final furlong.

ENTRY.NAME: Centavo
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed 4w 7/16, 5w upper, tired, eased

ENTRY.NAME: Lost in Rome
ENTRY.OWNER: Scuderi, Vincent S. and Gabrielle Farm
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 3-2w, up 7 1/6, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Portos
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved grd early, tip 3w 3/8, 4w 5/16, 7w upper, bid, rebuffed

ENTRY.NAME: King of Hollywood
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand ins, yielded 7/16, retreated, 2w 1/4p, eased

ENTRY.NAME: Just Call Ray
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased ins, coaxed 2p 3/8, cut corner, eased final 1/8th

ENTRY.NAME: Salto de Tigre
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, chased 2-3w, coaxed 3/8, angled 6w upper, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Bear Oak
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 3-4w, coaxed 3/8, 6w uppr, up 3/16, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Hang Tight
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w pursuit, coaxed 7/16, angled 4w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Bobby G
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, coaxed 2p 3/8, 6w uppr, passed tired foes

ENTRY.NAME: Lord Captain
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w 1st turn, chased 4-3w, coaxed 5/16, 4w upper, flattened out

RACE.RACE_TEXT: De La Rose S. SARATOGA RACE 8 1M Inner turf CR: 108. Stakes Purse 135000. INNER TURF FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A GRADED SWEEPSTAKE IN 2023. Non-Lasix race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $135 each which should accompany th e nomination; $675 to pass the entry box and an additional $675 to start. For horses not originally nominated, a supplemental payment of $675 in addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the closing of entries. The purse tob e divided 55% to the winner, 20% to second, 12% to third, 6% to fourth, 4% to fifth and 3% divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a Graded sweepstake on the turf in 2022 allowed 2 lbs.; of a sweepstake other thann state-bred in 2023 allowed 4 lbs.; of a sweepstake in 2022 other than state-bred or two races other than maiden, claiming, starter or State-bred allowance in 2023 allowed 6 lbs. The New York Racing Association reserves the right to transfer this race to
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TECHNICAL ANALYSIS (IRE) was hustled from the front then moved in, showed the way on the inside, was asked some on the far turn then roused for more near the quarter-pole, spun three wide into the stretch then dropped in a bit while straightening, shook off a foe under one tap of a right-handed crop into the final furlong and extended the advantage under a brisk hand-ride to prove much the best. WHITE FROST was taken up some while rank along the rail early, saved ground on the first turn, was reserved on the inside, raced inside on the final turn, was roused in the two path into the stretch, pursed the winner under a drive into the final furlong and proved no match while able to get the place. REGAL REALM stalked the pace on the outside in the two path while tugging on the bit under restraint, was let out on the far turn, came four wide into the stretch then dropped in a bit, chased the winner into the final furlong and weakened then just held the show. HAUGHTY was taken in hand between horses on the initial straightaway, went two then three wide on the first turn, was rated off the pace, rounded the far turn in the two path while between foes, was roused four wide into the stretch and lacked the needed response then just missed the show. EMINENT VICTOR dropped back early, traveled around the first turn in the two path, was reserved near the back, went two then three wide on the far turn, was roused five wide into the stretch, drifted in outside the sixteenth-pole and also lacked the needed response. EVVIE JETS was beaten to the front, shifted from the rail to the three path on the first turn, settled outside without the benefit of cover, was given her cue in the three path on the far turn, chased five wide into the stretch and tired. RUNAWAY RUMOUR angled in at the back, saved ground while reserved at the rear, spun into the two path entering the stretch and failed to rally.

ENTRY.NAME: White Frost
ENTRY.COMMENT: rank early,tkn up,rated inside,ask2p1/4,chased,earned place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 9 5 1/2F Turf CR: 98. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 162500. (PURSE $125,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $28,275 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 THREE TIMES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE N OT WON A RACE IN 2023 OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $80,000. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $80,000 (Allowance Hor ses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Five and One Half Furlongs on the Main Track). (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KAUFYMAKER established the front crossing directly to the two path placing some rivals in tight briefly, showed the way in hand just off the inside until tucked inside seven-sixteenths from home, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, edged clear under a drive to the eighth pole, held well and clear to the finish. SCOTISH STAR (ARG) chased just off the inside under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick. HAPPY SOUL chased along the inside under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, ran on to secure the show honors. MAIL ORDER chased three then two wide coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung three wide into upper stretch, kept on one paced to the finish. SPUN GLASS chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and swung three wide for home, offered no response. ADAAY IN ASIA (GB) chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch, offered no kick. SARAH HARPER appeared to clip a foe behind and bobble after the start being taken in hand and steadied very briefly conceding a length or two of position, chased three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled six wide into upper stretch and made no impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Happy Soul
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Scotish Star (ARG)
ENTRY.OWNER: La Providencia LLC and LNJ Foxwoods
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed 5/16, 4w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Spun Glass
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed ins near 1/4, 3w upper, no response

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, angled 4w upper, no kick

ENTRY.OWNER: Sparks William S Patterson William R Patterson Ty and Bell Stephen
ENTRY.COMMENT: clip, bobble after st, chased 3w, coaxed 5/16, 6w uppr, no impact

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 10 6F Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 35000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Clai m Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FULIGNI was taken in hand between foes early then settled off the pace, went around most of the turn in the two path then shifted three wide, rallied four wide into the stretch, closed strongly to get the lead inside the three-sixteenths, shook clear under a strong hand-ride into the final furlong, was put to a left-handed crop coming to the sixteenth-pole and proved much the best. LA AGUILILLA settled well back on the outside, was urged three wide on the turn then driven six wide into the stretch and finished willingly for the place. MO TOWN MADISON was carried in after the start, settled off the pace, saved ground on the turn, was roused outside the quarter-pole, came off the rail outside the eighth-pole, chased into the final furlong and weakened but just held the show. PERPETUAL PRAISE was hustled to the front, showed the way down the backstretch, vied inside on the turn, lost the advantage under a drive in upper stretch and tired then just lost the show. MADDIE'S SURPRISE angled in early then was straightened before making any contact with a rival, chased the pace on the outside then three wide on the turn, spun four wide into the stretch and capitulated. DEVILLY was urged along on the outside, went four wide on the turn, spun five wide into the stretch and came up empty. INTO TOURING settled at the back while inside of a foe, saved ground on the turn and was no factor. BABY SOX was hustled from the gate then came inward early, chased the pace on the outside, vied in the two path on the turn and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Perpetual Praise
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,inside pace,headed inside 3/16,weakened,lost show
